channel.title: Npc [317]
channel.description:
So....I made....Well, didn't make. But, edited an npc and added it back into the client and whatnot....But, here's my question.
How do I set the stand and walk animations for this npc? I've looked in npchandler and cannot find anything on walking and standing, I set the attack and death....
Anyone know? :rolleyes:
